com.clarkparsia.openrdf
Class ExtRepository

java.lang.Object
  org.openrdf.repository.base.RepositoryWrapper
      com.clarkparsia.openrdf.ExtRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
DelegatingRepository, Repository
public class ExtRepository
extends RepositoryWrapper

Extends the normal Sesame Repository, via RepositoryWrapper, with some additional utility functions.

Since:
0.1
Version:
1.0
Author:
Michael Grove

          Create a new in-memory ExtRepository

getStatements

public RepositoryResult<Statement> getStatements()
Return a RepositoryResult over all the statements in the repository.

Returns:
an iteration of all statements

getStatements

public RepositoryResult<Statement> getStatements(Resource theSubj,
                                                 URI thePred,
                                                 Value theObj,
                                                 Resource... theContext)
Return a RepositoryResult over the statements in this Repository which match the given spo pattern.

Parameters:
theSubj - the subject to search for, or null for any
thePred - the predicate to search for, or null for any
theObj - the object to search for, or null for any
theContext - the contexts for the statement(s)
Returns:
an Iterable over the matching statements

selectQuery

public TupleQueryResult selectQuery(QueryLanguage theLang,
                                    java.lang.String theQuery)
                             throws RepositoryException,
                                    MalformedQueryException,
                                    QueryEvaluationException
Execute a select query.

Parameters:
theLang - the query language
theQuery - the query to execute
Returns:
the result set
Throws:
RepositoryException - if there is an error while querying
MalformedQueryException - if the query cannot be parsed
QueryEvaluationException - if there is an error while querying

constructQuery

public com.clarkparsia.openrdf.ExtGraphImpl constructQuery(QueryLanguage theLang,
                                                           java.lang.String theQuery)
                                                    throws RepositoryException,
                                                           MalformedQueryException,
                                                           QueryEvaluationException
Execute a construct query against this repository

Parameters:
theLang - the query language
theQuery - the query string
Returns:
the results of the construct query
Throws:
RepositoryException - if there is an error while querying
MalformedQueryException - if the query cannot be parsed
QueryEvaluationException - if there is an error while querying

Parameters:
theStream - the stream to read data from
theFormat - the format the data is in
Throws:
java.io.IOException - thrown if there is an error while reading from the stream
RDFParseException - thrown if the data cannot be parsed into the specified format

getSubjects

public java.util.Collection<Resource> getSubjects(URI thePredicate,
                                                  Value theObject)
List all the subjects which have the given predicate and object.

Parameters:
thePredicate - the predicate to search for, or null for any predicate
theObject - the object to search for, or null for any object
Returns:
the list of subjects who have properties matching the po pattern.

getValue

public Value getValue(Resource theSubj,
                      URI thePred)
Return the value of the property on the resource

Parameters:
theSubj - the subject
thePred - the property to get from the subject
Returns:
the first value of the property for the resource, or null if it does not have the specified property or does not exist.

getSuperclasses

Parameters:
theRes - the resource
Returns:
the resource's superclasses

getValues

public java.lang.Iterable<Value> getValues(Resource theSubj,
                                           URI thePred)
Return the values of the subject for the given property

Parameters:
theSubj - the subject
thePred - the property of the subject to get values for
Returns:
an iterable set of values of the property

isList

public boolean isList(Resource theRes)
Return whether or not the given resource represents an rdf:List.

Parameters:
theRes - the resource to inspect
Returns:
true if it is an rdf:List, false otherwise

asList

Return the contents of the given list by following the rdf:first/rdf:rest structure of the list

Parameters:
theRes - the resouce which is the head of the list
Returns:
the contents of the list.
